bpp/descriptor.name: KAS commerce
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: My Seller Central provides Real-Time Business Performance Dashboards with AI/ML based Predictive Analytics and Deep Integration with Global Supply Chain Networks for Businesses selling on multiple e-commerce Marketplaces spread acrossthe World.

descriptor.name: KAS Store
descriptor.long_desc: e-commerce Marketplaces spread across the World.

descriptor.name: Sofa
descriptor.short_desc: A sofa, often referred to as a couch, is a piece of furniture designed for seating multiple people. It is a staple in living rooms, lounges, and reception areas, serving both functional and aesthetic purposes.

descriptor.name: Premium Black and Green Backpack Bag with Laptop Sleeve - Lightweight and Durable
descriptor.short_desc:
Sleek black and green design with two main compartments and accessory pocket Padded laptop sleeve for secure transport of your device
Comfortable padded back strap for all-day wear
Lightweight and durable construction, perfect for work, school, or travel
Made by Best Bags in America with special care instructions for long-lasting use
descriptor.long_desc: Upgrade your daily carry with our premium backpack bag in sleek black and green design. Featuring two main compartments, an accessory pocket, and padded laptop sleeve, this bag offers both style and functionality. The specially padded back strap ensures comfort even with heavy loads. Made by Best Bags in America, this bag is perfect for work, school, or travel.

descriptor.name: Study Table
descriptor.long_desc: The Sleep Pillow is your ticket to a restful night's sleep. This plush and ergonomic pillow is designed to provide optimal support for your head and neck, promoting proper alignment and comfort. With its hypoallergenic materials and breathable cover, the Sleep Pillow ensures a soothing and hygienic sleeping environment for a rejuvenating sleep experience.

descriptor.name: Iron
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing the Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray, your ultimate partner in maintaining hand hygiene in the most efficient way. With an 80% alcohol volume packed in a half-liter bottle, this sanitizer ensures your hands are clean and germ-free with just a mist. Its unique mist form delivery system is designed to make the sanitizer last longer, allowing for extended use up to 3 years. Manufactured by Be Sanitized in Beijing, China, and introduced at a special price of Rs 250, significantly lower than the market rate of Rs 300, this product offers both quality and value. The compact design, measuring 3cm in length, 10cm in height, and 5cm in width, and weighing just 250 grams, makes it perfect for on-the-go use. Available in a sleek white and transparent color, it's a stylish addition to your hygiene essentials. Stock is limited to 50 units, with a maximum purchase limit of 3 units per customer. Enjoy the convenience of cash on delivery, with a flexible return policy and a 5-hour cancellation window.

descriptor.name: Towel
descriptor.short_desc: Quik Dry Bath Towels deliver the ultimate experience in comfort. They are lighter, more durable, more absorbent than normal towels and feel
descriptor.long_desc: Quik Dry Bath Towels deliver the ultimate experience in comfort. They are lighter, more durable, more absorbent than normal towels and feel

descriptor.name: PLATE
descriptor.long_desc: Plates are a fundamental component of dining and culinary experiences, serving as the primary surface for presenting and consuming food. They come in a wide variety of shapes, sizes, materials, and designs, each tailored to different types of meals and occasions.
